integration_patterns: Data integration between EHRs and clearinghouses

evidence.claim: Simco utilizes AWS cloud services for data management and hosting.
Simco provides solutions that are HIPAA compliant, focusing on health data integration.
The company supports EDI transactions and is well-versed in X12 standards for healthcare.

icp.icp_reason: They engage in EDI transactions and HIPAA-compliant integrations, indicating ICP relevance.
